spiritsExplanation:

Additionally, the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is detected with a moderate score of 0.7 due to the use of continuous breath cycles described in the video. Other spirits were not applicable as there is no substantial focus on high energy/intensity, athleticism, or outdoor elements in the metadata provided.
